Metadata.description: Andrew Wiggin is a brooklyn based design engineer passionate about design systems, motion design and accessibility.

NotFound.headline: How’d you get here?
NotFound.body: When you’re ready, I’ll meet you at <home>home</home>.

Home.headline: Hi, I’m Andrew
Home.bio: I’m a brooklyn based design engineer passionate about design systems, motion design and accessibility.
Home.about: I explore unique ways to tell a story on the web. These days, I do most of my tinkering at the <mellon>Mellon Foundation</mellon>. Check out my <resume>resume</resume> or reach out via <email>email</email>.
Home.how_it_works: These colors use oklch to create an accessible color palette with <any_hue>any color</any_hue>. Interested in how it works? Check out <docs>the docs</docs>.
